function Rating (props) { const {rating, numReviews, caption} = props return (
=1 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >=0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } /> =2 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >=1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } /> =3 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >=2.5 ?
